abstract.original_text: The parvoviruses are a large family of physically similar viruses infecting animals as diverse as man and moth (1,2).

sentences.segment_text: The parvoviruses are a large family of physically similar viruses infecting animals as diverse as man and moth ( 1,2 ) .

abstract.original_text: Those which naturally infect vertebrates are divided into two subgroups, the adeno-associated viruses (AAV) and the autonomous parvoviruses.

sentences.segment_text: Those which naturally infect vertebrates are divided into two subgroups ,
the adeno-associated viruses ( AAV ) and the autonomous parvoviruses .

abstract.original_text: Members of the AAV subgroup, now also known as the Dependoviruses, are totally dependent upon either adenovirus or herpesvirus coinfection for their own replication.

sentences.segment_text: now also known as the Dependoviruses ,
are totally dependent upon either adenovirus or herpesvirus coinfection for their own replication .

abstract.original_text: At present there is no published evidence of a member of this subgroup naturally infecting rodents. There is no a priori reason, however for believing that such defective agents do not exist, and investigators studying rodent adenovirus or herpesvirus infections ±n_ vivo or in cell culture should be aware of the potential problems that such contaminants would present.

sentences.segment_text: At present there is no published evidence of a member of this subgroup naturally infecting rodents .
There is no a priori reason ,
however for believing that such defective agents do not exist ,
and investigators studying rodent adenovirus or herpesvirus infections ± n _ vivo or in cell culture should be aware of the potential problems that such contaminants would present .
